mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN sys_user cu on cu.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user uu on uu.id = a.create_by
mapper.insert:
insert into sys_user_role(
id, sys_user_id, sys_role_id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag
)
SELECT #{item.id}, #{item.sysUser.id}, #{item.sysRole.id}, #{item.createBy.id}, #{item.createDate}, #{item.updateBy.id}, #{item.updateDate}, #{item.delFlag} FROM dual
mapper.delete: delete from sys_user_role a where a.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update sys_user_role a SET a.del_flag = '1' where a.id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from sys_user_role a
where a.id in
#{item}
